components.accessList.accessListItems.de: When your book is private, readers will login using their email and login token
components.accessList.accessListStatusBu: Nobody is on your share list. Add your first reader
components.accessList.managePrivacyStatu: Readers added to your share list will login with their email and a login token
Visible to anyone that knows your handle
components.bookPrivacyStatus.description: Readers on your share list will be able to login and read your book
Anyone that knows your handle will be able to read your book
components.onboarding.userDetailsForm.de: Let's fill in your location and date of birth so we can setup your timeline.
components.publish.createBookForm.setHan: Now let's set your web address. This is where readers will access your book
components.publish.createBookForm.shareS: Finally, decide how you would like to share your book
While your book is offline readers will no longer have access to your book
components.publish.publishOptionsForm.de: Lets start with a few bits of information to help eReaders and other devices understand your book
components.settings.manageAccount.delete: If you want to delete your account, click below.

Proceeding will cancel any active subscriptions and schedule your account for deletion in 14 days.

All of your data will be permanently deleted and your book will no longer accessible online.

If you change your mind, login within the next 14 days to restore your account.

components.userPaymentForm.cancelled: Your subscription has ended. To restore access to Stories To Tell, please choose a subscription.
components.userPaymentForm.openMessage:
We hope you've enjoyed Stories To Tell so far, and have the beginnings of a wonderful book to share with your loved ones.

If you'd like to stick around once your trial is up, become a permanent member today by choosing a subscription below.
components.userPaymentForm.paymentFailed: Your last payment failed. Please update your payment method by clicking 'Manage subscription' below.
components.userVerifyForm.description.st: To use Stories To Tell, please confirm you have read our privacy policy and terms & conditions.
To use Stories To Tell, you'll also need to verify your email. If you haven't recieved a verification email, please click below to send
